channel.title: job on This Programming Life
channel.description: Recent content in job on This Programming Life

item.title: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Job Hunt
item.description: This is a story about finding a job as a senior software engineer in Toronto - with a twist: just having moved there from Germany. I was prepared. I had a plan. But it failed completely - at first. I had to adapt and learn. It was a roller coaster ride. I tell my story because it might help others learn from my mistakes. This is not meant as a bigger statement about immigration or the state of the tech scene.
